<title level="1" right="Rules">[Movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=2345)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 420 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your movement and position determine how you interact with the world. Moving in exploration and downtime modes is relatively fluid. Movement in encounter mode follows additional rules explained in [Tactical Movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=2355). The rules below apply in all modes of play.
</column>
